messages.title: Do you remember the time when older people used to be treated with respect?
messages.content:
I want to tell you that with Labour, that time is and always will be NOW!

There was a time when other political parties used to agree that:
- Pensioners are entitled to winter fuel payments to keep warm
- The Triple Lock is vital to protect pensioners’ incomes
- Elderly people should be able to pass their property on to their children and not have it sold to pay for care in their own home

Sadly the Conservatives have now broken this consensus and are refusing to provide the security and dignity in old age that our elderly citizens deserve. Thankfully, Labour has guaranteed all of this and more.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will invest an extra £8 billion into care services in the next parliament, reduce hospital waiting times, and create a new National Care Service.
Labour will always protect our NHS, create a new National Care Service and treat older people with the respect they deserve.

issues.health: Labour will always protect our NHS, create a new National Care Service and treat older people with the respect they deserve.
